inclusion.criterion: Adult male or female (surgically sterile or post-menopausal or confirmed not to be pregnant)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Trauma injury (blunt and/or penetrating) resulting in lactic acidosis due to hemorrhagic shock
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acidosis (blood lactate level ≥ 5 mmol/L; equivalent to 45 mg/dL) arterial or venous
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Normalization of lactate prior to dosing (≤ 2.2 mmol/L)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 23-year-old man who came to the hospital with high blood pressure and signs of septicemia.
